name: Escape The Turret
description:
Howdydiddly folks! This here is a nice little piece I put together for the Turret Jam! I know it is very simple in every way but BOY it was fun to do!

Instructions

You are strapped to a table with a turret pointing at you and counting down O_O You need to find your way of using things around you to escape before you get mowed down in this point and click game!

SFX - GameDevYal
